name: Inventory (Mike Murray)
description:
Github: King9999/FeelFree_UnityTest: This is a test for Feel Free Games. (github.com)

This was a test submission for a job I applied for (I didn't get it :( ). I didn't want this work to go to waste, so I decided to upload my work here for everyone to see or use. A gamepad is required.

The inventory involves moving 5 random icons around and rearranging them. You can create or destroy the icons at will. The test also required the shoulder buttons to change the screen resolution.

The icons are generated by using scriptable objects and 5 game objects to present the data. For each icon, I provided a short animated description, which was something extra I added for the test, among other things.

CREDITS

  • Music is "Journeys Ahead" by Andrea Baroni - https://cyberleaf.itch.io/a-journey-to-remember
  • Icons are from here: https://franuka.itch.io/rpg-icon-pack
  •  "Alagard" font by Hewett Tsoi - https://www.dafont.com/hewett-tsoi.d4888 
  • Button prompts are from this pack  https://retrocademedia.itch.io/buttonprompts4
